thread.title: Apple CEO Tim shrugs off concerns on China slowdown
thread.title_full: Apple CEO Tim shrugs off concerns on China slowdown

title: Apple CEO Tim shrugs off concerns on China slowdown
text:
Apple CEO Tim shrugs off concerns on China slowdown 
Times Of India Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
SHANGHAI: US technology giant Apple will keep investing in China despite slowing growth in the world's second-largest economy, chief executive Tim Cook said, as the company prepares to open its newest store in the mainland. "I know some people are worried about the economy. We'll continue to invest," Cook told the official Xinhua news agency, according to a report late Wednesday. "China is a superb place to be. Nothing has changed that," Cook said while on a visit to the country. China's economy logged its worst performance in the third quarter since the global financial crisis six years ago, ...
